Service Details: - Provides chiropractic services to treat back pain, headaches, whiplash in juries, neck pain, repetitive strain injuries, athletic injuries, tennis elbow, TMJ (jaw) disorders, soft tissue injuries, plantar fascitis, and running injuries- Offers massage therapy
